                speak Abigail "Really?$l#$b#This piece... it's special to me.$l#$b#I composed it while thinking about us, about our love story.$l"/

                speak Abigail "Joining the Adventurers Guild was a dream come true for me. It's been my passion for so long, and now I'm a part of it."/

                emote farmer 32/
                speak Abigail "It's because of you, @.$l#$b#You've supported me, believed in me when I doubted myself.$l#$b#You've made me a stronger person.$l"/

Entries.abigailLoveKiss: You know, I wake up every day feeling blessed to have you in my life.$l#$b#You've made everything brighter, more meaningful.$l#$b#I've been reflecting on how far we've come, from that first meeting to now.$l#$b#Our love has grown so beautifully.$l
Entries.abigailNoLoveKiss: I really thought we had something more special.$s
